EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-01-30 Tackling the Modern IT Ecosystem.ES-2019-01-28 Invite 4.Subject L
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-tackling-ecosystem/]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-tackling-ecosystem/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Did you know that Turbonomic's decision engine is technology-agnostic, supporting VMware, ServiceNow, PureStorage, RedHat, AWS, Azure, etc. and optimizes at every layer of the stack?
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-tackling-ecosystem/]]>
Join Eric Wright tomorrow, January 30th at 11 am ET, for the "Tackling the Modern IT Ecosystem <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-tackling-ecosystem/]]>" webinar, where you will learn how to enable workloads (applications, VMs, container) to get the resources they need when they need them, on-prem and in the cloud, to ensure you can increase agility - while decreasing human error and time to value. All registered attendees will be entered to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card. I hope to see you there. Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-tackling-ecosystem/]]>, and we will send you the recording afterward.
